name: stix
label: STIX
description: Structured Threat Information Expression, is a language and serialization format for exchanging threat information in cyberspace. Using this connector we can Extract indicators from the submitted STIX file and also Exports selected indicators from FortiSOAR in a valid STIX specification

operations.title: Extract Indicators From STIX File
operations.description: Extract indicators from the submitted STIX file. Supports STIX 2.0 and STIX 2.1

operations.title: Export Indicators In STIX Spec Format
operations.description: Exports selected indicators from FortiSOAR in a valid STIX spec, which can then be downloaded as a STIX file. Supports STIX 2.0 and STIX 2.1

parameters.title: FortiSOAR Indicator List
parameters.name: indicator_list
parameters.description: Specify list FortiSOAR Indicator in JSON format

parameters.title: Add Identity Details (For Indicator Source)

true.title: Name
true.name: gen_org_name
true.description: Specify the name of source Identity.

true.title: Class
true.name: gen_class
true.tooltip: The type of entity that source Identity describes, e.g., an individual or organization.
true.description: The type of entity that source Identity describes, e.g., an individual or organization.

true.title: Description
true.name: gen_org_description
true.description: A description that provides more details and context about the source Identity, potentially including its purpose and its key characteristics.

true.title: Role
true.name: gen_role
true.tooltip: The list of roles that source Identity performs (e.g., CEO, Domain Administrators, Doctors, Hospital, or Retailer).
true.description: The list of roles that source Identity performs (e.g., CEO, Domain Administrators, Doctors, Hospital, or Retailer).

true.title: Sector
true.name: gen_sector
true.tooltip: The industry sectors that source Identity belongs to.
true.description: The industry sectors that source Identity belongs to.

true.title: Email ID
true.name: gen_contact_info
true.tooltip: The contact information (e-mail, phone number, etc.) for source Identity.
true.description: The contact information (e-mail, phone number, etc.) for source Identity.

parameters.name: gen_spec_info
parameters.tooltip: Add details of Identity who is generating/sharing the threat information
parameters.description: Add details of Identity who is generating/sharing the threat information

parameters.title: Add Identity Details (For Receiving Entity)

true.title: Class
true.name: rec_class
true.tooltip: The type of entity that Receiving Identity describes, e.g., an individual or organization.
true.description: The type of entity that Receiving Identity describes, e.g., an individual or organization.

true.title: Description
true.name: rec_org_description
true.description: A description that provides more details and context about the Receiving Identity, potentially including its purpose and its key characteristics.

true.title: Role
true.name: rec_role
true.tooltip: The list of roles that Receiving Identity performs (e.g., CEO, Domain Administrators, Doctors, Hospital, or Retailer).
true.description: The list of roles that Receiving Identity performs (e.g., CEO, Domain Administrators, Doctors, Hospital, or Retailer).

true.title: Sector
true.name: rec_sector
true.tooltip: The industry sectors that Receiving Identity belongs to.
true.description: The industry sectors that Receiving Identity belongs to.

true.title: Email ID
true.name: rec_contact_info
true.tooltip: The contact information (e-mail, phone number, etc.) for Receiving Identity.
true.description: The contact information (e-mail, phone number, etc.) for Receiving Identity.

parameters.name: rec_spec_info
parameters.tooltip: Add details of Identity who is intended to receive the threat information
parameters.description: Add details of Identity who is intended to receive the threat information
